mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CSTYPE`, t1.`ENABLE`, t11.`GW`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`JTYY`, t1.`KHCJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t91.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t21.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME2`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t81.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t41.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME2`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMRANKID`, t51.`ORMRANKNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t1.`PIMPERSONID2`, t31.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONNAME2`, t1.`QSRQ`, t11.`RANK`, t1.`RS`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SJTPNUM`, t1.`STATUS`, case when trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate)<0 then 0 else trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) end AS `SYTS`, t1.`TCYY`, t1.`TPNUM`, t1.`TRMDUTYCADRESID`, t1.`TRMDUTYCADRESNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XGW`, t1.`XH`, t1.`YEAR`, t11.`YGBH`, t1.`ZJYCJXKHCJ`, t11.`ZW`, case when t11.`ZWRQ` is null then null else trunc(months_between(SYSDATE,t11.`ZWRQ`)) end AS `ZWNX`, t11.`ZWRQ`, t21.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_TRMDUTYCADRES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID2 = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t31 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t31.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t41 ON t11.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMRANK t51 ON t1.ORMRANKID = t51.ORMRANKID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t71.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t81 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t81.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t91 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t91.ORMDUTYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.BZ, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CSTYPE, t1.ENABLE, t11.GW, t1.JSRQ, t1.JTYY, t1.KHCJ, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t1.ORGSECTORID, t61.ORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMDUTYID, t91.ORMDUTYNAME, t1.ORMORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME2, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t81.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t41.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME2, t1.ORMPOSTID, t71.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMRANKID, t51.ORMRANKNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t1.PIMPERSONID2, t31.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PIMPERSONNAME2, t1.QSRQ, t11.RANK, t1.RS, t61.SHORTNAME, t1.SJTPNUM, t1.STATUS, case when trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate)<0 then 0 else trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) end AS SYTS, t1.TCYY, t1.TPNUM, t1.TRMDUTYCADRESID, t1.TRMDUTYCADRESNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XGW, t1.XH, t1.YEAR, t11.YGBH, t1.ZJYCJXKHCJ, t11.ZW, case when t11.ZWRQ is null then null else trunc(months_between(SYSDATE,t11.ZWRQ)) end AS ZWNX, t11.ZWRQ, t21.ZZDZS FROM T_TRMDUTYCADRES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID2 = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t31 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t31.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t41 ON t11.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMRANK t51 ON t1.ORMRANKID = t51.ORMRANKID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t71.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t81 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t81.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t91 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t91.ORMDUTYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CSTYPE`, t1.`ENABLE`, t11.`GW`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`JTYY`, t1.`KHCJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t91.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t21.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME2`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t81.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t41.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME2`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMRANKID`, t51.`ORMRANKNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t1.`PIMPERSONID2`, t31.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONNAME2`, t1.`QSRQ`, t11.`RANK`, t1.`RS`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SJTPNUM`, t1.`STATUS`, case when trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate)<0 then 0 else trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) end AS `SYTS`, t1.`TCYY`, t1.`TPNUM`, t1.`TRMDUTYCADRESID`, t1.`TRMDUTYCADRESNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XGW`, t1.`XH`, t1.`YEAR`, t11.`YGBH`, t1.`ZJYCJXKHCJ`, t11.`ZW`, case when t11.`ZWRQ` is null then null else trunc(months_between(SYSDATE,t11.`ZWRQ`)) end AS `ZWNX`, t11.`ZWRQ`, t21.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_TRMDUTYCADRES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID2 = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t31 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t31.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t41 ON t11.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMRANK t51 ON t1.ORMRANKID = t51.ORMRANKID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t71.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t81 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t81.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t91 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t91.ORMDUTYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.BZ, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CSTYPE, t1.ENABLE, t11.GW, t1.JSRQ, t1.JTYY, t1.KHCJ, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t1.ORGSECTORID, t61.ORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMDUTYID, t91.ORMDUTYNAME, t1.ORMORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME2, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t81.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t41.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME2, t1.ORMPOSTID, t71.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMRANKID, t51.ORMRANKNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t1.PIMPERSONID2, t31.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PIMPERSONNAME2, t1.QSRQ, t11.RANK, t1.RS, t61.SHORTNAME, t1.SJTPNUM, t1.STATUS, case when trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate)<0 then 0 else trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) end AS SYTS, t1.TCYY, t1.TPNUM, t1.TRMDUTYCADRESID, t1.TRMDUTYCADRESNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XGW, t1.XH, t1.YEAR, t11.YGBH, t1.ZJYCJXKHCJ, t11.ZW, case when t11.ZWRQ is null then null else trunc(months_between(SYSDATE,t11.ZWRQ)) end AS ZWNX, t11.ZWRQ, t21.ZZDZS FROM T_TRMDUTYCADRES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID2 = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t31 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t31.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t41 ON t11.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMRANK t51 ON t1.ORMRANKID = t51.ORMRANKID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t71.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t81 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t81.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t91 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t91.ORMDUTYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`BZ`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CSTYPE`, t1.`ENABLE`, t11.`GW`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`JTYY`, t1.`KHCJ`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t91.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t21.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME2`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t81.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t41.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME2`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t71.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMRANKID`, t51.`ORMRANKNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t1.`PIMPERSONID2`, t31.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONNAME2`, t1.`QSRQ`, t11.`RANK`, t1.`RS`, t61.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SJTPNUM`, t1.`STATUS`, case when trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate)<0 then 0 else trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) end AS `SYTS`, t1.`TCYY`, t1.`TPNUM`, t1.`TRMDUTYCADRESID`, t1.`TRMDUTYCADRESNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XGW`, t1.`XH`, t1.`YEAR`, t11.`YGBH`, t1.`ZJYCJXKHCJ`, t11.`ZW`, case when t11.`ZWRQ` is null then null else trunc(months_between(SYSDATE,t11.`ZWRQ`)) end AS `ZWNX`, t11.`ZWRQ`, t21.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_TRMDUTYCADRES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID2 = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t31 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t31.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t41 ON t11.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMRANK t51 ON t1.ORMRANKID = t51.ORMRANKID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t71.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t81 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t81.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t91 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t91.ORMDUTYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`STATUS` = '10' )

SELECT t1.BZ, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CSTYPE, t1.ENABLE, t11.GW, t1.JSRQ, t1.JTYY, t1.KHCJ, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t1.ORGSECTORID, t61.ORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMDUTYID, t91.ORMDUTYNAME, t1.ORMORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME2, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t81.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t41.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME2, t1.ORMPOSTID, t71.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMRANKID, t51.ORMRANKNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t1.PIMPERSONID2, t31.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PIMPERSONNAME2, t1.QSRQ, t11.RANK, t1.RS, t61.SHORTNAME, t1.SJTPNUM, t1.STATUS, case when trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate)<0 then 0 else trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) end AS SYTS, t1.TCYY, t1.TPNUM, t1.TRMDUTYCADRESID, t1.TRMDUTYCADRESNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XGW, t1.XH, t1.YEAR, t11.YGBH, t1.ZJYCJXKHCJ, t11.ZW, case when t11.ZWRQ is null then null else trunc(months_between(SYSDATE,t11.ZWRQ)) end AS ZWNX, t11.ZWRQ, t21.ZZDZS FROM T_TRMDUTYCADRES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID2 = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t31 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t31.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t41 ON t11.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMRANK t51 ON t1.ORMRANKID = t51.ORMRANKID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.ORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t71 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t71.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t81 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t81.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t91 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t91.ORMDUTYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.STATUS = '10' )
